title: Cafe Blumenhaus
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Mediterranean, Fast food, Juice bar, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Small, Arabic-inspired eatery with take-away coffee, salad, fresh juices, tea, and especially falafel. Ask for assistance and owner will point out what veg/vegan items there are.
